S02vadhdhdu:8_13_1: saṃvarṇitā vivṛtā uttānīkṛtā ārocitā ākhyātā daridrāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nānāvyādhiparipīḍitānāṃ sarvaduṣṭasattvabhayopadrutānām
S02vadhdhdu:8_13_2: arthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃbhogāya paribhogāya kṣemāya ceti /
S02vadhdhdu:8_14: ānanda āha ḥ udgṛhītā me bhagavann iyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā manasā suparicintitā ca sādhu bhagavann iti /
S02vadhdhdu:9_0_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs
S02vadhdhdu:9_0_1: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavataḥ mukham avalokya yadīdānīṃ tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthā abhāṣat /
S02vadhdhdu:10_1: āpūrṇam asmin gṛheṣu maṇḍalaṃ namo 'stu te śrīvasudhāraṇī sadā //
S02vadhdhdu:11_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt śrutvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:11_1: ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavanta dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ bhagavan dhārayāmy enaṃ dharmaparyāyam /
S02vadhdhdu:11_2_0: bhagavān āha ḥ sucandragṛhapatiparipṛcchety api ānanda dhāraya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnanidhānam ity api dhāraya
S02vadhdhdu:11_2_1: sarvatathāgatapraśastety api dhāraya sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhitā vasudhārādhāraṇīkalpam ity api dhāraya /
S02vadhdhdu:12_0_0: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān ānandas te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś
S02vadhdhdu:12_0_1: ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
S02vadhdhdu:14_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
S02vadhdhdu:14_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
